Comment: I'm in a purplish-red area that went red in 2024. We're a fairly small area in the suburbs. My congressional rep started out full, open MAGA. But for the last 2 months, she's been dodging the press and stripping her website of mentions of trump. Then on Saturday, my little area lit up with protests. She's gotta see the writing on the wall that she won't win in 2026 unless she divorces herself from MAGA. (Presuming, of course, that were not fully Authoritarian by then)
